parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain name that is secured by the certificate. The domain name must use HTTPS acceleration.

parameters.name: SSLPri
parameters.description: The private key. This parameter is required only if you enable the SSL certificate.

parameters.name: SSLProtocol
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the SSL certificate. Default value: off. Valid values:

*   **on**
*   **off**

parameters.name: SSLPub
parameters.description: The content of the certificate. This parameter is required only if you enable the SSL certificate.
